accessibility.text: Presenter notes 	So I put the stimuli in a fixed distance in the periphery, and vary three parameters, the
spacing between the elements,  which also varies the number of elements in the circle.

I asked observers to look at these stimuli and give a relatively quick judgement about which direction they appeared to be moving in. So this is a study of appearance with suprethreshold stimuli, not just detection.

Task: report whether stimulus appears to move clockwise or counterclockwise
Presenter notes 	So I put the stimuli in a fixed distance in the periphery, and vary three parameters, the
